text: my only ambition for the first 20 years was to become a lawyer and own nice things. then in my late teens i realized i care deeply about life around me — and in fact, in the entire universe. that was the end of the lawyer plan.

before ai diplomacy: animal rights, then effective altruism, then biosecurity policy at the biological weapons convention. each shift felt like a reinvention. looking back, the thread was always the same — find the highest-leverage thing.
i used to be a certified snowboard instructor. there's something about teaching someone to carve their first turn that never gets old.

i have no mental imagery. no inner voice. my long-term memory is purely semantic. i can't picture my mother's face or replay a song in my head. it makes me an unusual thinker — i process the world in abstractions, not images.
i rotate between yoga, hiit, and weights. flexibility, cardio, strength — pick any two on a given week.
primary mode of transport in geneva. car-free by choice.

many problems in the world may be engineering problems, but once you've found one, you've got a coordination problem — and those are usually framing problems. norms, trust, culture, how groups end up seeing the same thing. i think about this constantly.
i write a lot of google reviews because i think it's a public good. good places deserve visibility, bad places deserve accountability, and shaming is good actually.
lived a year near nashville through afs when i was 15. formative in ways i'm still unpacking.
played drums and trumpet. badly. the musical ambition eventually found its home in djing.
have read lord of the rings and eragon each in three languages. some books are worth experiencing in every tongue you have.

was vegan for three years but now think it's likely unhealthy for many people, and meat seems unfortunately integral to human nutrition. the solution isn't moral purity — it's accelerating lab-grown meat. which means accelerating ai. which means the path to fixing animal agriculture runs through the same tech stack as terraforming earth.
